meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>soil</kanji> <kanji>fence</kanji> is a fence made from soil. Usually this is in the form of a <vocabulary>mud wall</vocabulary> or an <vocabulary>earthen wall</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the rendaku.
